meanings.definition: A type of fungus that causes plant diseases.
meanings.sent1: The botrytis on the leaves made the plants sick.
meanings.sent2: The farmer had to remove the botrytis to save his crops.
meanings.sent3: The botrytis seemed to be playing a harmful prank on the garden.
meanings.sent4: The botrytis spread through the field like a dark shadow.
meanings.sent5: The botrytis crept silently, destroying everything in its path.
